text: Kaya tumhala ascarya vatate ki tumacya palanakartyatarphe ekhadi bodhapurna gosta tumacyatalyaca eka manasajavala ali ahe, yasathi ki tyane tumhala saceta karave. Smarana kara, jevha allahane tumhala nuhacya janasamuhanantara tyancya jagi kele ani tumaca sarira-bandha adhika vadhavila, yastava tumhi allahacya krpa denagyance smarana kara yasathi ki saphala vhave
